title: Conical function
summary: In mathematics, conical functions or Mehler functions are functions which can be expressed in terms of Legendre functions of the first and second kind, P − ( 1 / 2 ) + i λ μ ( x ) {\displaystyle P_{-(1/2)+i\lambda }^{\mu }(x)} and Q − ( 1 / 2 ) + i λ μ ( x ) . {\displaystyle Q_{-(1/2)+i\lambda }^{\mu }(x).}
